output: Craft an image of a man exuding assurance with his composed and confident expression. He's dressed impeccably in an elegant, sharply-tailored suit that reflects sophistication and success. The background comprises a striking modern skyscraper lobby, showcasing clean lines and cutting-edge design with reflective surfaces casting subtle gleams. This composition should convey an air of confidence and undeniable professionalism, perfect for inspiring admiration and respect in the viewer.
